channel.title: Why does this happen to me?
channel.description:
Hi, so i just started a server and my port forwarding works and everything is set to run. So i started the server and checked if it was online using google server checker and it says its online. The problem i have is that when i try and connect using a client this is what it says in the server CMD:
Connection from 192.168.**.*** <<< I have hidden my ip address. Connection reset java.net.SocketException: Connection reset at java.net.SocketInputStream.read<uknown Source> at client.fillinStream<client.java:9855 at client.run<client.java:18634> at java.lang.Thread.run<uknown Source> ClientHandler: Client null disconnected <192.168.**.***>
It does this three times then on the client it says "error connecting to server" If you know how to fix please let me know! Thanks

item.title: Why does this happen to me?
item.dc:creator: @death_t_d death t d
item.description:
@death_t_d wrote:

how do i fix this error?

Read full topic

item.title: Why does this happen to me?
item.dc:creator: @str_o_tek str o tek
item.description:
@str_o_tek wrote:

[quote=“death t d, post:1, topic:333478”]Hi, so i just started a server and my port forwarding works and everything is set to run. So i started the server and checked if it was online using google server checker and it says its online. The problem i have is that when i try and connect using a client this is what it says in the server CMD:

Connection from 192.168..* <<< I have hidden my ip address.
Connection reset
java.net.SocketException: Connection reset
at java.net.SocketInputStream.read
at client.fillinStream<client.java:9855
at client.runclient.java:18634
at java.lang.Thread.run
ClientHandler: Client null disconnected <192.168..*>

It does this three times then on the client it says “error connecting to server”
If you know how to fix please let me know! Thanks[/quote]lol u dont need to hide the ip wich starts with 192.168 etc, its just ur local ip
and it tries to tell you that there is an error in client.java at line 9855, and an other (or not an error, but got caused by the first) is on line 18634

Read full topic

item.title: Why does this happen to me?
item.dc:creator: @death_t_d death t d
item.description:
@death_t_d wrote:

Hi, so i just started a server and my port forwarding works and everything is set to run. So i started the server and checked if it was online using google server checker and it says its online. The problem i have is that when i try and connect using a client this is what it says in the server CMD:

Connection from 192.168..* <<< I have hidden my ip address.

java.net.SocketException: Connection reset
at java.net.SocketInputStream.read
at client.fillinStream<client.java:9855
at client.runclient.java:18634
at java.lang.Thread.run
ClientHandler: Client null disconnected <192.168..*>

It does this three times then on the client it says “error connecting to server”
If you know how to fix please let me know! Thanks
